sentences.en: In contrast, the aestival circulation shows the anticyclone pattern and its vertical structure has few changes in that season.
sentences.cn: 夏季流场比较复杂，总环流大致呈反气旋型，且垂向结构略有变化。

sentences.en: The difference of the accuracy of three interpolation methods for the aestival relative humidity was not significant.
sentences.cn: 对于三种插值方法，相对湿度的插值精度在夏季差异不明显。
